member.name: T:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.ReportOptions
member.summary: Encapsulates the options controlling the printing and previewing of a MindFusion.Scheduling report.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.ReportOptions.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the ReportOptions class.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.ReportOptions.OnStyleChanged(System.EventArgs)
member.param: An object, containing the event data.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.ReportOptions.OnAlternativeStyleChanged(System.EventArgs)
member.param: An object, containing the event data.

member.name: F:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.ReportOptions._showHeader
member.summary: Specifies whether the column headers are visible.

member.name: F:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.ReportOptions._showHeadersOnAllPages
member.summary: Specifies whether the column headers are displayed on top of each page or only on the first one.

member.name: F:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.ReportOptions._absoluteColumnWidth
member.summary: Specifies how to treat column width values.

member.name: F:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.ReportOptions._alternativeStyle
member.summary: The default style of alternative rows in a column.

member.name: F:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.ReportOptions._groupHeaderStyle
member.summary: The style for header rows in a grouped report.

member.name: F:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.ReportOptions._cellPadding
member.summary: The padding of the report cells.

member.name: F:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.ReportOptions._headerHeight
member.summary: The height of the column header.

member.name: F:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.ReportOptions._headerSpacing
member.summary: The spacing between header and contents.

member.name: F:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.ReportOptions._documentName
member.summary: The name of the print document.

member.name: F:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.ReportOptions._fixedRowHeight
member.summary: Specifies whether to use a fixed row height as specified by the RowHeight property or to calculate the height of individual rows according to the contained text.

member.name: F:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.ReportOptions._groupType
member.summary: The type of grouping of the report data.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.ReportOptions.ShowHeader
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the columns headers are displayed.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.ReportOptions.ShowHeadersOnAllPages
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the column headers are displayed on top of each page or only on the first one.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.ReportOptions.AbsoluteColumnWidth
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the width specified for individual columns are expressed in units relative to the page width or as points.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.ReportOptions.PageMargins
member.summary: Gets or sets the page margins.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.ReportOptions.Landscape
member.summary: Gets or sets the orientation of the pages.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.ReportOptions.CellPadding
member.summary: Gets or sets the padding of the resource cells, expressed in hundredths of an inch.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.ReportOptions.HeaderHeight
member.summary: Gets or sets the height of the columns' header, expressed in hundredths of an inch.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.ReportOptions.RowHeight
member.summary: Gets or sets the height of individual rows, expressed in hundredths of an inch.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.ReportOptions.HeaderSpacing
member.summary: Gets or sets the spacing between the header and the contents, expressed in hundredths of an inch.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.ReportOptions.ColumnSpacing
member.summary: Gets or sets the spacing between adjacent columns, expressed in hundredths of an inch.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.ReportOptions.RowSpacing
member.summary: Gets or sets the spacing between adjacent rows, expressed in hundredths of an inch.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.ReportOptions.DocumentName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the print document.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.ReportOptions.FixedRowHeight
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to use a fixed row height as specified by the RowHeight property or to calculate the height of individual rows according to the contained text.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.ReportOptions.GroupType
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether grouping is enabled within the report.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.ReportOptions.Style
member.summary: Gets or sets the default style used for columns in the report.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.ReportOptions.AlternativeStyle
member.summary: Gets or sets the default style for alternative rows.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.ReportOptions.GroupHeaderStyle
member.summary: Gets or sets the style for group headers in a grouped report.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.ReportOptions.UseCustomPreviewIcons
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to use the images specified through the CustomPreviewIcons property.

member.summary: Gets or sets the images to display in the built-in Print Preview form.

member.summary: Sets the parent style of this column's styles.

member.summary: The header text of the column.

member.name: F:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.ReportColumn._property
member.summary: The Item property displayed by the column.

member.name: F:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.ReportColumn._alternativeStyle
member.summary: The style for alternative rows in the column.

member.name: F:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.ReportColumn._width
member.summary: The width of the column, expressed in either percents or in pixels, depending on the appropriate option in the oprions.

member.name: F:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.ReportColumn._visible
member.summary: Specifies whether the column is visible.

member.name: F:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.ReportColumn._sort
member.summary: Specifies the sort of the column.

member.summary: Specifies the sort priority of the column.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.ReportColumn.Header
member.summary: Gets or sets the header text of the column.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.ReportColumn.Property
member.summary: Gets or sets the Item property displayed in the column.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.ReportColumn.Style
member.summary: Gets or sets the style of the column.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.ReportColumn.AlternativeStyle
member.summary: Gets or sets the style used for the alternative rows in this column.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.ReportColumn.Width
member.summary: Gets or sets the width of the column.
member.remarks: The width of the column is expressed in either percents or as hundredths of an inch depending on the ReportOptions.AbsoluteColumnWidth property.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.ReportColumn.Visible
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the column is displayed in the report.
member.remarks: Invisible columns can still be used for sorting.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.ReportColumn.Sort
member.summary: Gets or sets the sort of the column.
member.remarks: If you specify sorting by more than one column, you can use the SortPriority property to determine which sort should have greater priority.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.ReportColumn.SortPriority
member.summary: Gets or sets the sort priority of the column.
member.remarks: Columns with higher sort priority take precedence during sorting.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.ExcelGraphics.ToHtmlDashStyle(System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashStyle)
member.summary: Converts the specified DashStyle to its HTML representation.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.ExcelGraphics.ToClient(System.Drawing.Point)
member.summary: Transforms the specified point to client coordinates.
member.remarks: The coordinates supplied to the various methods of this graphics class are in document coordinates (that is, in the coordinates specified in the PageUnit property). This method converts from document coordinates to the point (1/72-th of an inch) coordinates expected by Excel.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.ExcelGraphics.ToClient(System.Drawing.PointF)
member.summary: Transforms the specified point to client coordinates.
member.remarks: The coordinates supplied to the various methods of this graphics class are in document coordinates (that is, in the coordinates specified in the PageUnit property). This method converts from document coordinates to the point (1/72-th of an inch) coordinates expected by Excel.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.ExcelGraphics.ToClient(System.Single)
member.summary: Transforms the specified value to client coordinates.
member.remarks: The coordinates supplied to the various methods of this graphics class are in document coordinates (that is, in the coordinates specified in the PageUnit property). This method converts from document coordinates to the point (1/72-th of an inch) coordinates expected by Excel.

member.name: F:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.ExcelGraphics.inner
member.summary: An internal graphics object used for measuring, transformations and stat tracking.

member.name: F:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.ExcelGraphics.pixelToPoint
member.summary: An internal graphics object used for pixel-to-point transformations.

member.name: F:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.ExcelGraphics.innerBitmap
member.summary: A bitmap used in the creation of the inner Graphics.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.ExcelGraphics.Transform
member.remarks: Only the translation component of this object is taken into consideration.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.ExcelGraphics.MinCellSize
member.summary: Gets or sets a value specifying a minimal size for the rows and columns in the graphics. Rows with height smaller than this value and columns with width smaller than this value are merged.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.ExcelGraphics.MaxCellSize
member.summary: Gets or sets a value specifying a maximal size for the rows and columns in the graphics. Rows with height bigger than this value and columns with height smaller than this value are split.

member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.Cache.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.Cache.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.Cache.Resources.ExAboveHighBound
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to '{0}' is not a valid value for '{1}'. '{1}' must be less than or equal to '{2}'..

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.Cache.Resources.ExArrayLength
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The length of the array is not valid for '{0}'. The length must be '{1}'..

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.Cache.Resources.ExBadType
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to '{0}' is not a valid value for '{1}'. '{1}' must be derived from '{2}'..

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.Cache.Resources.ExBelowLowBound
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to '{0}' is not a valid value for '{1}'. '{1}' must be greater than or equal to '{2}'..

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.Cache.Resources.ExNullArgument
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to '{0}' cannot be null..

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.Cache.Resources.ExOutOfRange
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to '{0}' is not a valid value for '{1}'. '{1}' must be greater than or equal to '{2}' and less than or equal to '{3}'..

member.name: T:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.RowData
member.summary: Contains the data for a single row in a MindFusion.Scheduling report.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.RowData.#ctor(MindFusion.Scheduling.Item)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the RowData class.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.RowData.#ctor(MindFusion.Scheduling.Item,MindFusion.Scheduling.Resource)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the RowData class.

member.name: F:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.RowData._item
member.summary: A reference to the item represented by this row.
member.remarks: This may be null if the row represents a resource header in a grouped report.

member.name: F:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.RowData._resource
member.summary: A reference to the resource associated with the item represented by this row, or the resource represented by this row if the row is a header in a grouped report.
member.remarks: This is null in non-grouped reports.

member.name: F:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.RowData._values
member.summary: A list containing Pair objects. The first element of the pair represents the original item value, corresponding to the report column with the same index as the index of the Pair element within this list. The second element represents the textual representation of the value.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.RowData.Item
member.summary: Gets the item associated with this row.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.RowData.Resource
member.summary: Gets the resource associated with this row.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.RowData.Values
member.summary: Gets a list with pairs containing the values displayed in the report and their textual representations.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.ContinuePrintingReportEventArgs.ContinuePrinting
member.summary: Call this method if you want the print operation to continue on a new page with the view settings specified in the Calendar control. Call this method only once per event to avoid unnecessary calculations.

member.summary: A reference to the Report being printed.

member.summary: A flag, indicating whether to continue printing with the new settings.

member.summary: Gets a reference to the Report control being printed.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.ContinuePrintingReportEventArgs.ShouldContinuePrinting
member.summary: Gets a flag indicating whether the printing should continue with the new calendar settings.

member.name: T:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.Report
member.summary: Provides methods to generate, preview and print reports of Schedule objects.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the Report class.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.Report.CreateColumn
member.returns: A ReportColumn object representing a newly created column, compatible with the report.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.Report.Preview(System.DateTime,System.DateTime)
member.summary: Generates a print preview of the items in the specified range from the underlying schedule.
member.param: A DateTime object, specifying the beginning of the time interval containing the items to be included in the report.
A DateTime object, specifying the end of the time interval containing the items to be included in the report.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.Report.Preview(System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument,System.DateTime,System.DateTime)
member.summary: Generates a print preview of the items in the specified range from the underlying schedule.
member.param: A .NET PrintDocument object to print to.
A DateTime object, specifying the beginning of the time interval containing the items to be included in the report.
A DateTime object, specifying the end of the time interval containing the items to be included in the report.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.Report.ExportExcel(System.String,System.DateTime,System.DateTime)
member.summary: Exports the items in the specified range from the underlying schedule as an Open Office XML format.
member.param: The name of the XLSX file to export to.
A DateTime object, specifying the beginning of the time interval containing the items to be included in the report.
A DateTime object, specifying the end of the time interval containing the items to be included in the report.

member.param: The name of the PDF file to export to.
A DateTime object, specifying the beginning of the time interval containing the items to be included in the report.
A DateTime object, specifying the end of the time interval containing the items to be included in the report.

member.summary: Returns the size, expressed in points, of the page with the specified format.

member.summary: The schedule to be printed / previewed.

member.summary: The list of all rows displayed in the view.

member.name: F:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.Report._start
member.summary: Temporary variable for storing the start time of the processed interval.

member.summary: Temporary variable for storing the end time of the processed interval.

member.name: F:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.Report._columnWidths
member.summary: The precalculated widths of all columns in the report, expressed in printer coordinates.

member.summary: A temporary pointer to the top visible row in the current print page.

member.name: F:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.Report._printColumn
member.summary: A temporary pointer to the left visible row in the current print page.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.Report.Schedule
member.summary: Gets or sets the schedule to be printed or previewed by the report.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.Report.Options
member.summary: Gets the options, controlling the print output.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.Report.Columns
member.summary: Gets a collection with all columns in the report.

member.name: E:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.Report.QueryText
member.summary: Raised during the printing or previewing to allow clients to customize particular texts displayed in the report.

member.name: E:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.Report.QueryHeaderText
member.summary: Raised to allow clients to customize the text of column headers.

member.name: E:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.Report.QueryStyle
member.summary: Raised during the printing or previewing to allow clients to customize the style of elements displayed in the report.

member.name: E:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.Report.FilterItem
member.summary: Raised for each individual item in the report during printing or previewing to confirm the item's availability in the report.

member.name: E:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.Report.ContinuePrinting
member.summary: Raised at the end of a printing operation to enable users to continue printing the report with different view settings.

member.name: T:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.Resources
member.remarks: In .NET 1.1 and earlier, this class operates on the built-in resources found in the 'Global.resources'. In .NET 2.0 and later, this class reads the resources directly from the project resources. The public interface of the class remains unchanged.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.Resources.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the Resources class.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.Resources.Instance
member.summary: Retrieves the sole instance of the Resources class.

member.summary: Retrieves a string resource given its name.

member.summary: Retrieves a string resource given its name and culture.

member.summary: Retrieves and formats a string resource given its name.

member.summary: Retrieves and formats a string resource given its name and culture.

member.name: T:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.ReportFilterItemEventArgs
member.summary: Contains the arguments passed to handlers of the FilterItem event raised by the Report class.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.ReportFilterItemEventArgs.#ctor(MindFusion.Scheduling.Item)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the ReportFilterItemEventArgs class.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.ReportFilterItemEventArgs.SetItem(MindFusion.Scheduling.Item)
member.summary: Internal setter of the underlying item to avoid unneeded event args instantiation.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.ReportFilterItemEventArgs.SetResource(MindFusion.Scheduling.Resource)
member.summary: Internal setter of the underlying resource to avoid unneeded event args instantiation.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.ReportFilterItemEventArgs.Item
member.summary: Gets the item related to the event.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.ReportFilterItemEventArgs.Resource
member.summary: Gets the resource related to the item in a grouped report.
member.remarks: In a grouped report the event FilterItem is fired once for each resource an item is associated with. This way it is possible to filter the same item for one resource and to retain it for another.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.ReportFilterItemEventArgs.Filter
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the item should be filtered out of the report.

member.name: T:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.ReportQueryTextEventArgs
member.summary: Contains the arguments passed to handlers of the QueryText event raised by the Report class.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.ReportQueryTextEventArgs.#ctor(MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.ReportColumn,MindFusion.Scheduling.Item,MindFusion.Scheduling.Resource,System.Object,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the ReportQueryTextEventArgs class.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.ReportQueryTextEventArgs.Column
member.summary: Gets the column where the text would appear.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.ReportQueryTextEventArgs.Item
member.summary: Gets the item related to the event.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.ReportQueryTextEventArgs.Resource
member.summary: Gets the resource related to the item in a grouped report.
member.remarks: In a grouped report the event QueryText is fired once for each resource an item is associated with. This way it is possible to display one text for the same item for one resource and another text for another resource.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.ReportQueryTextEventArgs.Value
member.summary: Gets the object that would be displayed.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reporting.ReportQueryTextEventArgs.Representation
member.summary: Gets or sets the text representation of the object.
